expo.name: AI Makeup Assistant
expo.description: Get personalized makeup recommendations using AI technology. Upload your selfie and discover your perfect makeup style with curated products and step-by-step instructions.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photos to let you select a selfie for makeup analysis.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to let you take a selfie for makeup analysis.

plugins.cameraPermissionText: This app needs access to camera for real-time facial analysis and makeup try-on.
